alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Fergus County below 4500ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 2:32AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely be slick and hazardous, including this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures steadily fall to the single digits and low teens through this morning.
info.instruction: Carry a winter safety kit in your vehicle.
